events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer's complaint has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide your order number and pictures of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 846392 and attached are photos showing that the item is not what I ordered at all.
We have confirmed the mistake and can offer a full refund or send the correct item immediately. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a refund. Thank you for resolving this quickly, I appreciate your help.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We just wanted to check in and ensure you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the refund process was completed successfully and no further actions are required.
